Please do not repost images from my tumblr or twitter account, thank you.

by eelisabethh

Pepper is very pregnant, and finally goes into labor. Tony isn’t home. Neither is Happy. That leaves Peter to drive her to the hospital. Cue the chaos and a type of love none of them have felt before.

summary:
Peter: So dad got invited to an event that Stephen Strange is attending.
Rhodey: okay and? 
Tony: and We all have to go see...
body:
Peter: So dad got invited to an event that Stephen Strange is attending.

Rhodey: okay and?

Tony: and We all have to go see Stephen.

Rhodey: Why? it’s not like he’ll remember you

blog.name: ofstarsandfireflies
blog.title: Such little light in a world of darkness
blog.description: 27 F who's OTPs are Destiel and Ironstrange

body:
Guys…

What if Robert Downey Jnr has just been hanging around the Captain Marvel set annoying Jude Law?


Better than that; what if RDJ has been trying to get Jude Law a role in the MCU for years now and Marvel were like ALRIGHT FINE HE CAN HAVE THIS PART JESUS CHRIST ROBERT


Even better than that; What if Jude Law’s character survives Captain Marvel and he and Tony Stark have a scene or 2 in Avengers 4?


So much better than that; what if RDJ plays a young Tony Stark in Captain Marvel? We already saw him in CACW


Guys. I’m dying here. GUUUUYSSSS

blog.name: captain-thicc
blog.title: I Love you 3000
blog.description: hey, there, I cry everytime I hear Tony's name, would you like to join me? ;)

summary:
Peter: I got a detention :c
Tony: What happened and you're grounded
Peter: Well when the teacher was standing in front of the...
body:
Peter: I got a detention :c

Tony: What happened and you’re grounded

Peter: Well when the teacher was standing in front of the chalk broad she asked all idiots to stand up…

Tony: Ok, so?

Peter: I stood up and said to her “well I didn’t want you to feel lonely”

Tony: You’re ungrounded

reblog.comment:

blog.title: R I P O Q
blog.description: Denise | She/her | bi 🧞‍♀️ Fandoms took over my life help

summary:
[Civil War]
Tony: How could Steve betray us like that? Pepper, I’m sure you can figure out a way to get back to him!
Pepper:...
body:
[Civil War]


Tony: How could Steve betray us like that? Pepper, I’m sure you can figure out a way to get back to him!

Pepper: Well I usually sleep with the persons boyfriend, but I feel like I’m already doing that…
